N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 157.2 - Fire safety

State Regulations

Pursuant to subdivision 3 of section
4604
of the

Education Law, the superintendent of schools and the person administering and
supervising adult continuing education programs shall assure that notification
is provided to participants in adult continuing education classes of the
emergency procedures to be followed in the event of fire. Such notification
shall be provided during the first meeting of the class or, for classes in
progress on September 20, 1986, during the next class meeting after such date. Such notification shall include, but need not be limited to, information about
the fire alarm system, location of exits, means of egress, and evacuation
procedures in the event of fire. Notes
